# webrequest Provider

This provider can interact with any rest compatible endpoints. It work like the command line tool _curl_

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "webrequest" {
  timeout = 30
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `timeout` (Number) Request Timeout
